Ndidzaimba zachifundo ndi chiweruzo;ndidzaimba zakukulemekezani Inu, Yehova.
Ndidzachita mwanzeru m'njira yangwiro;mudzandidzera liti?Ndidzayenda m'nyumba mwanu ndi mtima wangwiro.
Sindidzaika chinthu choipa pamaso panga;chochita iwo akupatuka padera chindiipira;sichidzandimamatira.
Wakuneneza mnzake m'tseri ndidzamdula;wa maso odzikuza ndi mtima wodzitama sindidzamlola.
Maso anga ayang'ana okhulupirika m'dziko, kuti akhale ndi Ine;iye amene ayenda m'njira yangwiro, iyeyu adzanditumikira Ine.
Wakuchita chinyengo sadzakhala m'kati mwa nyumba yanga;wakunena mabodza sadzakhazikika pamaso panga.
Mamawa onse ndidzadula oipa onse a m'dziko;kuduliratu onse akuchita zopanda pake kumudzi wa Yehova.
